intro: Echinodorus amazonicus, commonly known as the Amazon sword plant, is a popular aquatic plant native to the Amazon River basin. It is characterized by its broad, sword-shaped leaves that can grow up to 30 cm in length. The plant thrives in freshwater environments and is often used in aquariums for its aesthetic appeal and ability to provide oxygen and shelter for aquatic life. It prefers moderate to high light conditions and can tolerate a range of water temperatures. Echinodorus amazonicus is also known for its ability to help maintain water quality by absorbing nutrients and heavy metals.
